attributes.action: Make the NHS Legal Independent Body free from ministerial control & interferance
attributes.background: Each year the same problems with the NHS, winter crisis, shortage of staff and cash. No matter how much money is provided, the problems are never solved: In this, Political interferance does not help. A structure that is politically independent and accountable is what is needed to modernise the NHS.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
